contextId.occurrenceNote: This is hendiadys and emphasizes that the people will "tremble in anguish." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hendiadys]])
Here "thick darkness" describes the cloud. Alternate translation: "with a thick, dark cloud" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hendiadys]])
contextId.glQuote: with darkness, cloud, and thick darkness

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "jealousy" describes "the anger of Yahweh." Alternate translation: Yahweh's jealous anger" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hendiadys]])
contextId.glQuote: the anger of Yahweh and his jealousy

contextId.occurrenceNote: The writer is communicating one idea through two words. Alternate translation: "What does this terrible anger mean?" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hendiadys]])
contextId.glQuote: What does the heat of this great anger mean?
